name: Manhattan
method: Stir in mixing glass and strain
variations: Rob Roy (use Scotch Whisky), Brandy Manhattan (Brandy instead of Whiskey), Metropolitan (3:1 ratio Whiskey and Vermouth), Cuban Manhattan (Dark Rum instead of Whiskey), Tijuana Manhattan (Anejo Tequila instead of Whiskey), Fourth Regiment (1:1 ratio of Whiskey and Vermouth and 3 dashes, 1 each, of Orange, Celery and Peychaud's Bitters)

ingredients.ingredientName: Sweet Vermouth (Sweet Manhattan)/Dry Vermouth (Dry Manhattan)/1 part each (Perfect Manhattan)

garnish: Maraschino Cherry (Sweet Manhattan)/Lemon Twist (Dry Manhattan)/Orange Twist and Lemon Twist and Maraschino Cherry (Perfect Manhattan)
